properties.address: Longhorsley Village Hall, Morpeth, Northumberland NE65 8UR
properties.description: We hold a coffee morning every Wednesday morning in the village hall. This is open to anyone, and is a warm and welcoming atmosphere. We regularly have about 30 people attending. Conversation flows, any problems can be discussed. Everyone supports each other. We have a wonderful Warm Space team of 5 volunteers who help on the day. We provide homemade cheese scones, biscuits, teas and coffees. Everything is free, but people do tend to put a Â£1 donation in a pot, which goes towards running our village hall.
properties.title: Longhorsley Warm Space
